name: Option_equalsTest
description: Unit tests for the equals method in the Option class.

test_cases.name: testEqualsSameObject
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method when comparing the same object.

test_cases.name: testEqualsDifferentType
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method when comparing with a different type.

test_cases.name: testEqualsDifferentShortOption
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method when comparing options with different short options.

test_cases.name: testEqualsDifferentLongOption
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method when comparing options with different long options.

test_cases.name: testEqualsSameOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the equals method when comparing options with the same short and long options.
